clues.text: Thomas Hooker & his congregation settled at this Connecticut capital in 1636

Venus appears in his "Primavera" as well as in his "Birth of Venus"
This Spaniard portrayed himself as well as the king & queen of Spain in "Las Meninas"
This Belgian artist's "Golconda" shows dozens of bowler-hatted men floating through the sky

rounds.comments: (Alex: In our clues we will give you a couple of countries, or a number of countries, and you have to come up with the country that would be in the middle, or surrounded by these others--for example, if I said, "The answer is Canada and Mexico", your response, of course, would be, "What is the United States?")
